frameset.edef: to light or kindle. To set on fire

example.parse: (TOP (S (S (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC فِعْلاً)) (NP-SBJ (PRON_3MS هُوَّ)) (NP-PRD (NOUN إِعْلام) (ADJ قَذِر))) (CONJ وِ) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS عَرَف) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR (WHADVP-1 (INTERROG_ADV إِزّاي)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يِشَعَّل) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN نار) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الفِتْنَة))) (NP-ADV (NOUN بِين) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP الجَزائِر) (CONJ وِ) (NOUN_PROP مَصْر))) (ADVP-MNR (-NONE- *T*-1)))))))))
